+.. envvar:: DJANGO_EXPERIMENTER_HOST

body_text: "Experimenter" should be a link, using RST syntax, instead of being included directly here. You can see an example of how to do this in the DJANGO_AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID setting above.
body: "Experimenter" should be a link, using RST syntax, instead of being included directly here. You can see an example of how to do this in the `DJANGO_AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID` setting above.
